attributes.action: make the payment of EMA fairer to provide incentive for all children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Payment of EMA currently applies to every student who stays on at school, if their families income is under £30,000.This payment is discriminating against children who come from families with a moderate income-why should a student who comes from, say, a single parent family, be able to have a 'windfall' of £30 per week to spend as they wish.Either all students should get this payment or the criteria be reviewed to allow for the children of the taxpayers to be given an incentive also!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
